page.title: 11BLAGDON YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The are{26}people in our youth club. It's held in the school hall on {Wednesday}night from 7-00pm till 8-00pm. It costs 10p. Mellony Kay is the organiser with the help from Debbie Smith, Mrs Herbert and Mr Grassby. Inside the hall there is a tuck shop with sweets at a reasonable price.There is a snooker table, a table tennis table and a dart board. In the{winter}we stay indoors and listen to records and enjoy table tennis competitions, or play snooker and darts. In the{summer}we sometimes go over to the Mead and the BMX track and we play rounders and football. Our fun helpers are Roger Dring and Stuart Mainwaring. Two years ago they attended our school. They arrange for us to go ice skating and to go and watch films.
